content:
For those who were not present during the Amsterdam FHIR DevDays event: the "Where is Grahame" poster can be found here: www.ringholm.com/persist/where_is_grahame.pdf (hi-resolution PDF, meant to be printed on A3 format). Please join DevDays next year in either Boston or Amsterdam - which has the side effect that you may end up on next years version of this poster. But first: "Where is Grahame?"
whereisgrahame.jpg
I'm sure the Google folk could train a machine model to find where Grahame is in the picture :)
Would be interesting to upload it to Facebook and see if the auto tag suggestions catch him :D
